translations: （葡）先生（等于 Mr.或 Sir）；绅士

sentences.sentence: Empregada : O senhor quer um quarto individual ou de casal ?
sentences.translation: 先生你想要一间单人房或要一间双人房呢？

sentences.sentence: When they are being formal they often use "Senhor" or "Senhora" with first name rather than last.
sentences.translation: 当在正式场合，他们经常使用Senhor(先生)或Senhora(女士)在加上对方的名字而不是姓氏。
